comprehensive_overview: GATK is a powerful software package for genomic data analysis, particularly focused on variant discovery and genotyping. Developed by the Broad Institute, GATK offers a wide range of tools for processing high-throughput sequencing data, identifying genetic variations, and interpreting genomic datasets.
core_features: Genomic data analysis and variant discovery
Tools for genotyping and DNA sequencing analysis
Interpreting genetic variations and genomic data
